dct_alternative_sm: New general map of the southwestern war battlefield eastern sheet (Isonzo-Front)
dct_description_sm: R. Lechner (Wilh. Müller) ; k.u.k. Hof- und Univ.-Buchhandlung ; Kommissions-Verlag des k.u.k. militär-geogr. Institutes Wien I, Graben 31.
Shows topography (woods, marshland, coasts, etc.), cities and towns, waterways, various locations, roads, railroads, boundaries.
